1.title: Princess Diana - Her Life in Jewels

episode of.title: Princess Diana: Her Life in Jewels (TV Series 2011â€“ )

1.plot: From fairy-tale wedding to tragic funeral, the extraordinary life of Diana, Princess of Wales, was a chronicle of jewels, each marking distinct junctures in her life. Beginning with the infamous sapphire engagement ring, Diana was showered with gems each of which held a unique significance to the current events in her life. This revealing program follows the stories of Diana's most famous gems.

imdb.plot outline: From fairy-tale wedding to tragic funeral, the extraordinary life of Diana, Princess of Wales, was a chronicle of jewels, each marking distinct junctures in her life. Beginning with the infamous sapphire engagement ring, Diana was frequently showered with gems each of which held a unique significance to the events in her life at the time: the Spencer tiara at her wedding; the bracelet and cufflinks that signalled Charles' betrayal; the 'Swan Lake' suite marking the beginning of her love affair with Dodi Fayed; and finally the ring purchased by Dodi just days before the fatal crash in 1997. This revealing film follows the stories of Diana's most famous gems.
imdb.title: Princess Diana: Her Life in Jewels

This revealing film follows the stories of Diana's most famous gems.
